viaduct.travel.drop_denied: Dropping while riding is not allowed
viaduct.speed.change.end.correct: change Speed to %s ticks per chunk
viaduct.speed.changed.toofar: too far away, end speed change
tooltip.viaduct.usage: Can color all viaducts with dyes, change transparency using wool or glass, and adjust light level with glowstone dust (only for Basic & Facade Viaducts).
tooltip.viaduct_facade.desc: A decorative cover for pipes and cables
tooltip.viaduct_facade.usage: Right-click any pipe or cable to apply the facade. For compatibility, additional blocks/pipes/cables can be added via config. Only applicable to blocks with a smaller hitbox.
tooltip.viaduct_linker.desc: Connector viaduct used as start and goal
tooltip.viaduct_linker.usage: Right-click to open GUI, shift+Right-click to open ID screen.
tooltip.viaduct_detector.usage: Detects players passing through. Has a 3-second cooldown.
tooltip.viaduct_speed.usage: Right-click to change speed (ticks per chunk, default 97 = 32 ticks). Shift+Right-click with an item/block to set ID. Multiple boosters with the same ID change the speed together.
